blocks.content: 3. The Most Comprehensive Google Gemini Deep Dive

Google Gemini isn’t just chat—it’s a **native multimodal AI platform**: it understands text, images, audio, video, and PDFs, offers long context (up to ~1,000,000 tokens depending on model/endpoint), and provides a developer-friendly API & AI Studio.
Gemini Feature Overview

items: **Model family**: 2.5 Pro (deep reasoning), 2.5 Flash (cost-effective), 2.5 Flash-Lite (lowest latency/high throughput), 2.5 Flash Image (aka “nano-banana”, image generation/editing), Veo 3 / Veo 3 Fast (video generation).
**Multimodal**: inputs can be text/image/audio/video/PDF; supports long-context analysis.
**API & AI Studio**: you can **create a free API key**, easy to start; advanced usage and video generation are typically paid tiers.
**Safety & labeling**: generated images carry **SynthID** watermarks for provenance/identification.

blocks.content: ⚙️ Gemini Setup & Getting Started (AI Studio / API Key) (Full details in the next lesson; this page first shows how to obtain an API key)

Beginners should try models in **Google AI Studio** first, then port successful prompts into code. Creating an API key takes just a few steps; the free tier already covers most text/multimodal experiments.
1. Go to AI Studio to get an API key.
2. Find the “Create API key” button in the top right
3. Choose an existing project (optional), click “Create API key”, and you’re done!

Usage Tips & Analysis (Beginner-Friendly)
1. Model Selection Guide

definitions.definition: Ultra-low latency/high throughput, suitable for large-scale batch or real-time systems; ~200 daily uses and currently completely free!!!
Fast and cost-effective, covers most daily tasks (QA, summarization, image-text understanding); currently free as well.
Focused on **deep reasoning + long context (~1,000,000 tokens)**. Great for long-document synthesis, complex analysis, and code understanding.
**Image generation/editing** specialist: portrait/character consistency, natural-language local edits, multi-image fusion; list price about **$0.039/image**.
**Video generation** (with audio): supports 1080p and 16:9/9:16. Veo 3 ~ **$0.40/sec**; Veo 3 Fast ~ **$0.15/sec**.

blocks.content: 2. Gemini Strengths & Weaknesses (Beginner’s view)

items: Native **multimodality**: mix text/image/audio/video/PDF in one conversation.
**Long context**: more stable for long docs, frame-by-frame video explanation, cross-file synthesis.
**API-friendly**: AI Studio + free API key; great for teaching and prototyping.
Free tier has **quota and rate limits**; video generation is typically paid.
Different entry points (Gemini App / API / Vertex AI) have **different model availability and quotas**—check official pages before deploying.
Generated images contain **SynthID** (visible/invisible) watermarks; if you require “no watermark” images, evaluate separately.

blocks.title: Classroom Tip
blocks.content: Suggested demo flow: start with 2.5 Flash-Lite for a PDF summary → switch to 2.5 Pro to show long context & reasoning → use 2.5 Flash Image for local edits → finish with Veo 3 Fast to generate a vertical (9:16) short video.
